content: Hi all, just wanted to say that (as @acfoltzer mentioned) my team at Fastly would be interested in taking on implementation work! Are there others interested in doing implementation as well? If so, let's coordinate!
I don't know how much help I'd be (I have not made any changes to the compiler before), but I certainly wouldn't mind trying! If nothing else I can help review PRs, I think.
Yes, that's great, we should open up an issue with mentoring steps. @Amanieu is probably best suited to writing out what is needed but I guess I could do it in a pinch.
I guess we gotta land the RFC first ;)
Short answer: look for the code that deals with #[unwind(allowed)] and start there.
